Posts.Content: Jul 29, 2012 06:26PM Provetgal wrote: Wow...your situation sounds so similar to mine. I am dealing with recurrence...have been on Faslodex for 9 treatments so far, and now diagnosed with RA which is so debilitating...I cannot open jars, or doors.  My grip strength is gone.  The pain in my feet is constant.  Haven't started treatment for RA yet.  I'm thinking of dropping the faslodex and seeing if the RA symptoms improve.  So hard...never easy...no one understands what I am going through...
Posts.Title: Just wanted to check in... LuAnnH CoolBreeze
